item.title: Goldsmith (Level 6)
item.description: Reviewed patches before committing with git diff --cached.

item.title: Master Author (Level 7)
item.description: Made 2^Level commits using git commit.

item.title: Architect (Level 4)
item.description: Created a new repository with git init.

item.title: Master Socialite (Level 7)
item.description: pushed a branch to a remote repository using git push

item.title: Apprentice Miller (Level 3)
item.description: Add only part of a file to the stage 158 times with git add -p.

item.title: Apprentice Blacksmith (Level 2)
item.description: Created a branch using git checkout -b.

item.title: Apprentice Presenter (Level 3)
item.description: Shows one or more objects (blobs, trees, tags and commits) with git show

item.title: Master Historian (Level 8)
item.description: Investigate the commit log using git log.

item.title: Apprentice Merchant (Level 3)
item.description: Added an external repository with git remote add.

item.title: Product Manager (Level 5)
item.description: Stash the changes in a dirty working directory away with git stash.

item.description: Add only part of a file to the stage 131 times with git add -p.

item.title: Master Stone Mason (Level 7)
item.description: Added files to the index area for inclusion in the next commit with git add

item.title: Apprentice Cathedral Worker (Level 1)
item.description: Cloned submodule repository and checked out commits specified by superproject.

item.title: Collector (Level 6)
item.description: Fetches named heads or tags from another repository with git fetch

item.title: Author (Level 6)
item.description: Made 2^Level commits using git commit.

item.title: Apprentice Thug (Level 1)
item.description: Forced pushed a branch with git push -f

item.title: Weaver
item.description: Investigate old branches by using git reflog

item.title: Homeowner
item.description: Set global email address using git config.

item.description: Set global user name using git config.
